reg:regulation.reg:title:
Government Body Designation
and Deeming Regulation

bcl:section.bcl:text: In this regulation, Act means the Financial Administration Act.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Public authorities designated as government bodies
bcl:section.bcl:text: Each of the following public authorities is designated, under paragraph (d) of the definition of "government body" in section 1 of the Act, as a government body for the purposes of the Act:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the Greater Vancouver Sewerage and Drainage District;
an improvement district as defined in the Local Government Act.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Organizations deemed to be government bodies
bcl:section.bcl:text: The Providence Health Care Society is an organization deemed, under section 88 (2) (b) of the Act, to be a government body for the purposes of Parts 8, 9 and 9.1 of the Act.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Financial Administration Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 138, ss. 1 and 88.]
